name: ads_integrator_brick
description: The integrator for integrating data from BDS storage to ADS

parameters.name: bds_bucket
parameters.description: The BDS Bucket name. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: bds_folder
parameters.description: The BDS folder, where the account-token structure is present. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The account for current integrator. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token for current integrator. The structure on BDS looks like this: bds_bucket/bds_folder/account_id/token

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The ID of current integrator instance. ID need to present in configuration.json file
